remarks.format: ## Remarks `XmlValidatingReader` 实现类，并进行数据验证提供支持。`XmlValidatingReader` implements the class and provides support for data validation. 使用属性使读取器使用缓存中的架构文件验证。Use the property to have the reader validate by using schema files that are cached in an . 属性指定读取器应执行的验证类型。The property specifies what type of validation the reader should perform. 将属性设置为 ValidationType.None 创建非验证读取器。Setting the property to ValidationType.None creates a non-validating reader. 引发的 XML 分析错误。 throws an on XML parse errors. 引发异常后读取器状态不是可预测的。After an exception is thrown the state of the reader is not predictable. 例如，报告的节点类型可能不同于当前节点的实际节点类型。For example, the reported node type may be different than the actual node type of the current node. 使用属性检查是否在读取器处于错误状态。Use the property to check whether a reader is in error state. > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 从返回的所有节点给定`XmlReader`也会返回此验证读取器，因此在过程中没有不丢失信息。All nodes returned from the given `XmlReader` are also returned from this validating reader, so there is no information loss in the process. 未从基础读取器返回的新节点可能会添加此读取器 （例如，默认属性和实体引用的子级）。New nodes not returned from the underlying reader may be added by this reader (for example, default attributes and the children of an entity reference). 设置任何属性给定`XmlTextReader`也适用于此验证读取器。Any properties set on the given `XmlTextReader` also apply to this validating reader. 例如，如果提供的读取器必须为 WhitespaceHandling.None 集，此验证读取器还会忽略空白区域。For example, if the supplied reader had WhitespaceHandling.None set, this validating reader also ignores white space. 当进行验证，需要外部文档类型定义 (Dtd) 或架构属性集对象用于解析外部资源。When external document type definitions (DTDs) or schemas are needed for validation, the property sets the object to use for resolving external resources. ## Examples 下面的示例验证两个文档。The following example validates two documents. [!code-cpp[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/CPP/valid_xsd2.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/CS/valid_xsd2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/VB/valid_xsd2.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下输入的文件：The sample uses the following input files: `notValidXSD.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/XML/notvalidxsd.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/XML/books.xsd#3)] `inlineXSD.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.Cctor#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.Cctor/XML/inlinexsd.xml#4)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此构造函数将给定的字符串分析为 XML 的片段。This constructor parses the given string as a fragment of XML. 如果 XML 片段的元素或属性，可以跳过格式正确的 XML 文档的根级别规则。If the XML fragment is an element or attribute, you can bypass the root level rules for well-formed XML documents. 下表列出了有效值`fragType`和读取器如何分析每个不同的节点类型。The following table lists valid values for `fragType` and how the reader parses each of the different node types. |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|片段可能包含Fragment May Contain| |-----------------|--------------------------| |元素Element|任何有效的元素内容 （例如，元素、 注释、 处理指令、 cdata、 文本和实体引用的任意组合）。Any valid element content (for example, any combination of elements, comments, processing instructions, cdata, text, and entity references).| |特性Attribute|属性 （在引号内的部分） 的值。The value of an attribute (the part inside the quotes).| |DocumentDocument|整个 XML 文档; 的内容这会强制文档级别规则。The contents of an entire XML document; this enforces document level rules.| 读取器使用以下步骤来确定的流的编码：The reader uses the following steps to determine the encoding of the stream: 1. 检查属性来确定的编码。Checks the property to determine the encoding. 2. 如果`Encoding`属性是`null`，读取器检查流的开始处的字节顺序标记。If the `Encoding` property is `null`, the reader checks for a byte-order mark at the beginning of the stream. 3. 如果`Encoding`属性是`null`，并找到无字节顺序标记，则读取器假设在 utf-8 中编码流。If the `Encoding` property is `null`, and no byte-order mark is found, the reader assumes the stream is encoded in UTF-8. 如果将使用文档类型定义 (DTD) 验证此读取器 (即设置为 ValidationType.DTD 或 ValidationType.Auto)，则`XmlParserContext`中的指定构造函数必须提供所需的所有文档类型信息。If this reader will be validating using document type definition (DTD) (that is, is set to ValidationType.DTD or ValidationType.Auto), the `XmlParserContext` specified in the constructor must supply all the necessary DocumentType information. > [!NOTE] > 不能使用 DTD 验证片段。It is not possible to validate a fragment by using a DTD. 根据定义 DTD 要求整个文档加载进行验证。By definition a DTD requires an entire document to be loaded for validation. 如果此读取器将通过使用 XML 数据缩减 (XDR) 或 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构进行验证，使用属性来指定包含的架构 (即，`XmlParserContext`不需要提供文档类型信息）。If this reader will be validating by using XML-Data Reduced (XDR) or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas, use the property to specify the that contains the schemas (that is, the `XmlParserContext` does not need to supply the DocumentType information).

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 联网的 XML 文档通过使用各种 World Wide Web 联合会 (W3C) 标准包含机制聚合的数据块组成，因此包含来自不同位置的节点。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated by using various World Wide Web Consortium (W3C) standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. 文档类型定义 (DTD) 实体是举例说明此操作，但这并不局限于 Dtd。document type definition (DTD) entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基 URI 将指示您从这些节点的源位置。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 如果没有要返回的节点没有基 URI （例如，它们已从分析的内存中字符串），则返回 String.Empty。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), String.Empty is returned. ## Examples 下面的示例分析文件并显示每个节点的基 URI。The following example parses a file and displays the base URI of each node. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用该文件，`uri.xml`作为输入。The example uses the file, `uri.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.BaseURI Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `style.xml`文件包含的 XML 文本``。The `style.xml` file contains the XML text ``.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 读取任何外部引用时 （如扩展的文档类型定义 (DTD) 文件中的实体或读取架构文件） 的 encoding 属性设置为在外部引用的编码值。When any external reference is read (such as expanding an entity in a document type definition (DTD) file or reading a schema file) the encoding property is set to the encoding value of the external reference. 如果在外部引用中未指定编码，并且没有任何字节顺序标记，这将默认为 utf-8。If encoding is not specified in the external reference, and there is no byte-order mark, this defaults to UTF-8. 支持所有基础操作系统支持的编码标准。All the encoding standards that the underlying operating system supports are supported.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此方法的内容流式处理、 对 Base64 内容解码并返回解码后的二进制字节 （例如，内联 Base64 编码 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method streams the content, decodes the Base64 content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以连续调用此方法，以读取大的嵌入文本流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个：用于指定和 Internet 消息正文的格式描述机制"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以获得从 Rfc[征求意见文档网站](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). > [!NOTE] > 不应访问的任何读取器属性调用之间方法，直到该方法返回值 0。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value 0. 此方法具有以下行为：This method has the following behavior: - 它已达到处理字节流的末尾时返回的值为 0。 returns the value 0 when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 读取器位于第一个非内容节点上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果您要求更少，或在其当前位置中保留的字节数比流，读取器中剩余的精确数目。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number, of bytes than are left in the stream, the reader remains in its current position. - 不支持以下 XML 节点类型：元素、 XmlDeclaration，None、 文档、 DocumentType、 表示法、 实体和 DocumentFragment。 is not supported on the following XML node types: Element, XmlDeclaration, None, Document, DocumentType, Notation, Entity, and DocumentFragment.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此方法读取元素内容，对使用 Base64 编码，对其进行解码并返回已解码的二进制字节 （例如，内联 Base64 编码 GIF 图像） 到缓冲区。This method reads the element content, decodes it using Base64 encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline Base64 encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 有关详细信息，请参阅 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途 Internet 邮件扩展） 部分一个：用于指定和 Internet 消息正文的格式描述机制"。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以获得从 Rfc[征求意见文档网站](https://www.rfc-editor.org)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://www.rfc-editor.org). 此方法可读取只有简单内容的元素。This method can read only simple-content elements. 元素可以包含文本、 空白、 有效空白、 CDATA 部分、 注释和处理指令。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments, and processing instructions. 它还可以包含实体引用，会自动扩展。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 元素不能具有子元素。The element cannot have child elements. 此方法是非常类似于方法，但它可以调用仅在元素节点类型上。This method is very similar to the method except that it can be called only on element node types. 如果`count`值高于在文档中的字节数是否等于在文档中的字节数或读取该文档中的所有剩余字节，并返回读取的字节数。If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法调用会返回 0 并将读取器移动到节点以下。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the . 如果您调用的所有元素内容使用之前，读取器的行为类似于第一个内容，然后调用方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 这意味着读取器将读取所有文本，直到遇到结束元素。This means that the reader will read all the text until the end element is encountered. 然后它将阅读结束标记节点、 读取下一个节点，并最后将自身定位到下一个后续节点。It will then read the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node.

Public Overrides Function ReadString () As String

summary.span: 将元素或文本节点的内容读取为一个字符串。

span.span: Reads the contents of an element or text node as a string.

returns.span: 该元素或文本节点的内容。

span.span: The contents of the element or text node.

returns.span: 如果读取器定位在元素或文本节点以外的位置，或者当前上下文中没有其他文本内容可返回，则这可以是空字符串。

span.span: This can be an empty string if the reader is positioned on something other than an element or text node, or if there is no more text content to return in the current context.

para.span: 文本节点可以是元素或属性文本节点。

span.span: The text node can be either an element or an attribute text node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 如果定位在元素上，`ReadString`一起连接所有文本、 有效空白、 空白和 CDATA 部分节点类型，并返回串联的数据作为元素内容。If positioned on an element, `ReadString` concatenates all text, significant white space, white space, and CDATA section node types together and returns the concatenated data as the element content. 读取器停止时遇到任何标记，包括注释和处理指令。The reader stops when any markup is encountered, including comments and processing instructions. 这可以在混合内容模型中发生，也可以在读取元素结束标记时发生。This could occur in a mixed content model, or when an element end tag is read. 如果定位在文本节点上`ReadString`执行相同的串联文本节点从到元素结束标记。If positioned on a text node, `ReadString` performs the same concatenation from the text node to the element end tag. 如果读取器定位在属性文本节点上，则 `ReadString` 与读取器定位在元素开始标记上时的功能相同。If the reader is positioned on an attribute text node, `ReadString` has the same functionality as if the reader were position on the element start tag. 它返回所有串联在一起的元素文本节点。It returns all the concatenated element text nodes. 属性确定如何`ReadString`的工作方式如下：The property determines how `ReadString` works as follows: |“值”Value|描述Description| |-----------|-----------------| |ExpandEntitiesExpandEntities|返回扩展的字符和常规实体。Returns expanded character and general entities. 这是默认设置。This is the default.| |ExpandCharEntitiesExpandCharEntities|返回的文本内容，但不是包括常规实体引用。Returns the text content up to but not including a general entity reference. 这意味着常规实体都会导致 ReadString 停止。This means a general entity causes ReadString to stop. 必须调用`Read`到单步跳过的实体引用。You must call `Read` to step over the entity reference.| ## Examples 以下示例显示每个元素的文本的内容。The following example displays the text content of each of the elements. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.IsEmptyElement Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用该文件，`elems.xml`作为输入。The example uses the file, `elems.xml`, as input. remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 例如，如果架构类型指`xsd:int`，运行时类型`int32`的对象返回。For example, if the schema type is defined as `xsd:int`, the runtime type `int32` is returned for the object. 可以使用测试这方法，并强制转换相应地。This can be tested using the method and cast accordingly. 方法始终返回派生自的类型类。The method always returns a type that is derived from the class. 它将永远不会返回类型。It never returns the type. 如果读取器定位在属性上，此方法返回运行时类型化的对象，但不会更改读取器位置。If the reader is positioned on an attribute, this method returns the runtime typed object, but does not change the position of the reader. 如果读取器定位在元素上，`ReadTypedValue`读取任何 CDATA、 文本、 空白、 有效空白和注释节点返回运行时类型化的对象并将读取器定位的结束标记。If the reader is positioned on an element, `ReadTypedValue` reads any CDATA, text, white space, significant white space, and comment nodes, returns the runtime typed object and positions the reader on the end tag. 例如没有直接的映射，任何类型`NMTOKENS`，以字符串形式返回。Any types that do not have a direct mapping, for example `NMTOKENS`, are returned as strings. > [!NOTE] > 如果已设置为 ValidationType.None，数据类型信息不提供从架构或文档类型定义 (Dtd)。If has been set to ValidationType.None, data type information is not provided from either schemas or document type definitions (DTDs). > [!CAUTION] > 在调用，`ReadTypedValue`将返回`null`。After calling , `ReadTypedValue` will return `null`. ## Examples 下面的示例显示在 XML 文档中的每个元素的类型信息。The following example displays the type information for each of the elements in the XML document. [!code-cpp[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/CPP/schematype.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/CS/schematype.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/VB/schematype.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下输入的文件。The example uses the following input files. `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/XML/booksschema.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.SchemaType/XML/books.xsd#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. `XmlSchemaCollection`包含预加载的 XML 数据缩减 (XDR) 和 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构。The `XmlSchemaCollection` holds pre-loaded XML-Data Reduced (XDR) and XML Schema definition language (XSD) schemas. 此属性为读取者访问权限提供的架构缓存，并允许它进行验证，而无需每次都重新加载架构。This property gives the reader access to the cache of schemas and allows it to validate without having to re-load schemas every time. 读取器不会添加任何内容到`XmlSchemaCollection`。The reader does not add anything to the `XmlSchemaCollection`. 如果`XmlSchemaCollection`包括 XML 架构 (XSD) 包含`include`或`import`仅出于验证目的加载这些其他命名空间引用其他命名空间，架构的元素。If the `XmlSchemaCollection` includes an XML schema (XSD) which contains `include` or `import` elements that reference other namespaces, the schemas for these other namespaces are loaded for validation purposes only. 除非这些架构未显式添加到架构集合，它们将无法访问使用任何集合方法或属性。Unless these schemas were explicitly added to the schema collection, they will not be accessible using any of the collection methods or properties. 例如，如果集合包含的架构文件`a.xsd`，其中包含对架构文件的引用`b.xsd`，则必须添加`b.xsd`到架构集合之前可以使用任何集合方法或属性进行访问。For example, if the collection contains the schema file `a.xsd`, which contains a reference to the schema file `b.xsd`, you must add `b.xsd` to the schema collection before you can access it using any of the collection methods or properties. 当`XmlSchemaCollection`使用访问`Schemas`属性，方法使用指定的属性。When the `XmlSchemaCollection` is accessed using the `Schemas` property, the method uses the specified by the property. > [!NOTE] > 必须将架构添加到`XmlSchemaCollection`之前第一个`Read`调用。The schemas must be added to the `XmlSchemaCollection` before the first `Read` call. ## Examples 下面的示例验证三个使用 XmlSchemaCollection 中存储的架构的 XML 文件。The following example validates three XML files using schemas stored in the XmlSchemaCollection. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下五个输入的文件：The sample uses the following five input files: `booksSchema.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `booksSchemaFail.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#3)] `newbooks.xml` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#4](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#4)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#5](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#5)] `schema1.xdr` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example#6](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.Schemas Example/XML/source.xml#6)]

summary.span: 设置事件处理程序以接收有关文档类型定义 (DTD)、XML 数据简化 (XDR) 架构和 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 架构验证错误的信息。

span.span: Sets an event handler for receiving information about document type definition (DTD), XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema, and XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema validation errors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 这些事件发生期间且仅当DTD、 XDR、 架构或自动程序指定。These events occur during and only if a of DTD, XDR, Schema, or Auto is specified. 如果不提供任何事件处理程序，则（严重级别等于 XmlSeverityType.Error） 的第一个验证错误时引发。If no event handler is provided, an is thrown on the first validation error (Severity is equal to XmlSeverityType.Error). > [!NOTE] > 如果某个元素报告验证错误，不验证该元素的内容模型的其余部分，但是，将验证其子级。If an element reports a validation error, the rest of the content model for that element is not validated, however, its children are validated. 读取器仅报告给定元素的第一个错误。The reader only reports the first error for a given element. 可以使用回调处理程序属性以确保根据架构进行验证 XML 实例文档。The callback handler can use the property to guarantee that an XML instance document is validated against a schema. `Severity`属性可用于区分验证错误 （严重级别等于 XmlSeverityType.Error） 指明出现错误，并验证警告 （严重性等于 XmlSeverityType.Warning），指出没有架构提供了信息。The `Severity` property allows you to distinguish between validation errors (Severity is equal to XmlSeverityType.Error) that indicate a fatal error, and validation warnings (Severity is equal to XmlSeverityType.Warning) that indicate that no schema information is available. ## Examples 下面的示例验证针对 XML 架构文件。The following example validates a file against an XML Schema. [!code-cpp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/CPP/source.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下两个输入的文件：The sample uses the following two input files: `notValidXSD.xml` (`xsi:schemaLocation`属性读取器标识 XML 架构。)`notValidXSD.xml` (The `xsi:schemaLocation` attribute identifies the XML Schema for the reader.) [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/XML/source.xml#2)] `books.xsd` [!code-xml[Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/Classic WebData XmlValidatingReader.ValidationEventHandler Example/XML/source.xml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. 此属性表示当前节点驻留在其中的 xml: lang 范围。This property represents the xml:lang scope within which the current node resides. 例如，下面是与 XML 片段`xml:lang`设置为美国英语的根元素中：For example, here is an XML fragment with `xml:lang` set to U.S. English in the root element: ```xml Fred ``` 当读取器定位在`name`元素中，您可以使用此属性来发现它是否在美国的作用域英语`xml:lang`属性。When the reader is positioned on the `name` element, you can use this property to find that it is in the scope of a U.S. English `xml:lang` attribute.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 类中已过时[!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]。The class is obsolete in [!INCLUDE[dnprdnext](~/includes/dnprdnext-md.md)]. 您可以创建验证使用的实例类和方法。You can create a validating instance by using the class and the method. 有关详细信息，请参阅 引用页的“备注”部分。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. `XmlResolver`用于加载任何 Dtd、 实体或完成验证过程所需的架构。The `XmlResolver` is used to load any DTDs, entities, or schemas needed to complete the validation process. 可以随时设置此属性并且将会影响下一步后调用。This property can be set at any time and takes affect after the next call. 如果此属性设置为`null`，读取器假设用户不想在解析外部引用。If this property is set to `null`, the reader assumes the user is not interested in resolving external references. 在这种情况下，读取器只验证针对内部资源，如果资源存在。In this case, the reader only validates against internal resources, if the resource is present. 在 1.1 版中[!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)]，如果未设置此属性，该应用程序的信任级别将确定默认行为。In version 1.1 of [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] , if this property is not set, the trust level of the application determines the default behavior. `Fully trusted code:` 读取器使用默认值使用没有用户凭据。`Fully trusted code:` The reader uses a default with no user credentials. 如果访问网络资源需要身份验证，使用`XmlResolver`属性来指定`XmlResolver`与所需的凭据。If authentication is required to access a network resource, use the `XmlResolver` property to specify an `XmlResolver` with the necessary credentials. `Semi-trusted code:` `XmlResolver`属性设置为`null`。`Semi-trusted code:` The `XmlResolver` property is set to `null`. 不解析外部资源。External resources are not resolved. 在验证时使用的架构，可以通过提供避免昂贵的加载进程使用属性。When validating using schemas, you can avoid the expensive load process by providing an using the property. ## Examples 下面的示例使用`XmlResolver`属性来指定访问网络的 DTD 文件所需的凭据。The following example uses the `XmlResolver` property to specify the credentials necessary to access the networked DTD file. [!code-cpp[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/CPP/vrdr_resolver.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/CS/vrdr_resolver.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/VB/vrdr_resolver.vb#1)] 该示例使用以下文件作为输入。The example uses the following files as input. `book5.xml` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/XML/book5.xml#2)] `books.dtd` [!code-xml[XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlValidatingReader.XmlResolver/XML/books.dtd#3)]
